channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Testimonials
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Testimonials

item.title: CVE-2022-3539|2024-08-03T01:14:02.480Z -- unknown -- testimonials
item.description: The Testimonials WordPress plugin before 2.7, super-testimonial-pro WordPress plugin before 1.0.8 do not sanitize and escape its settings, allowing high privilege users such as admin to perform cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed.
